properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 14 at 2:12PM PST until February 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Steep northwest seas of 11 to 14 ft at 15 seconds through
this evening. South winds 20 to 25 kt are expected Saturday
into Saturday night, along with steep wind driven seas of 10 to
11 feet.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds and/or steep seas will pose an increased
risk of damage or capsizing to smaller vessels. Long period
swell will increase the size of the surf zone and may result in
hazardous bar conditions.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should remain in port and avoid the area of hazardous
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY
